text:
Question on the new reporting tool. So love the idea about multi-attribution model and seeing influenced revenue.
How far back does that go if a campaign exists. I remember something about it was being recorded well before the new reports came out. Can someone give me some further insight? Client is looking for some answers and potentially purchasing another solution.

Hey All. Just a heads up that we enabled all partner accounts for the new Design Manager. If we for some reason missed your portal, or you want access for one of your clients just fill out the form here: <http://designers.HubSpot.com/design-manager-beta>
<@U22PU4G4A> pinned a message to this channel.
Hi All. Wondering if anyone has been able to add multiple owners to contacts and use teams/security to show the single contact record in multiple teams (or users)?
